name: Naughty Corp
description:
DETAILS: Resume:

Manage your own villains company and try to conquer the entire world.

This game is a combination between RTS and Resource management. You will have your center operations where you will control all the payments and all the resources. You will have to explore the world if you want to become the most feared villain of all times.

Contract villains, conquer cities, fight heroes and enjoy the game!

Developed by:

Joel Perez

Francesc Balsells

Arnau Vilar
